definitions.definition: To synchronize , especially in the senses of data synchronization, time synchronization, or synchronizing music with video.
examples: Our cloud storage automatically syncs your files to all your devices.

definitions.definition: To flush all pending I/O operations to disk .

main_definition: ( informal ) To synchronize , especially in the senses of data synchronization, time synchronization, or synchronizing music with video.
secondary_definitions: ( informal , computing ) To flush all pending I/O operations to disk .
